report.title: Moth Trap Locations list with trap information
report.description: Lists trap locations and location attributes, decoding the complex lamp attribute from JSON.
report.query:
SELECT #columns# FROM ( SELECT l.id, pl.name AS country, l.name, l.centroid_sref, ctt_trap_type.term AS trap_type, lav_other_trap.text_value AS other_trap, string_agg( concat( lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'quantity', ' x ', CASE WHEN position('Please describe' in lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term') = 0 THEN -- No description needed lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term' ELSE -- Take the term, less 'Please describe', concatenated with the description. concat( substring(lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term' for (position('Please describe' in lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'type_term') - 1)), lav_lamp_type.text_value::json->>'description' ) END ), E',
\n') AS lamp_types FROM locations l JOIN locations pl ON pl.id = l.parent_id AND pl.deleted = false JOIN locations_websites lw ON l.id = lw.location_id AND lw.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_trap_type ON lav_trap_type.location_id = l.id AND lav_trap_type.location_attribute_id = #trap_type_attr_id# AND lav_trap_type.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt_trap_type ON ctt_trap_type.id = lav_trap_type.int_value LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_other_trap ON lav_other_trap.location_id = l.id AND lav_other_trap.location_attribute_id = #other_trap_type_attr_id# AND lav_other_trap.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav_lamp_type ON lav_lamp_type.location_id = l.id AND lav_lamp_type.location_attribute_id = #lamp_type_attr_id# AND lav_lamp_type.deleted = false WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id = #location_type_id# AND #website_filter# GROUP BY l.id, pl.name, l.name, l.centroid_sref, trap_type, other_trap ) traps JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct s.id) AS samples FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON l.id = lw.location_id AND lw.deleted = false JOIN samples s ON s.location_id = l.id AND s.deleted = false WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id = #location_type_id# AND #website_filter# GROUP BY l.id ) counts ON traps.id = counts.id

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: The ID of the Moth Trap location type.

param.name: trap_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the moth trap type.

param.name: other_trap_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the description of other moth trap types.

param.name: lamp_type_attr_id
param.description: The ID of the attribute holding the moth lamp type.
